blue-topaz-theme@@font-text-theme: 'Maple Mono NF CN', Bookerly,'Inter', 'Segoe UI','霞鹜文楷 GB', 'LXGW WenKai', 'Segoe UI Emoji',var(--font-interface)
blue-topaz-theme@@font-monospace-theme: 'Maple Mono NF CN', 'JetBrains Mono', Consolas, Monaco, '等距更纱黑体 SC', 'Source Han Mono', 'Microsoft Yahei Mono', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Microsoft YaHei', 'Source Code Pro', monospace
blue-topaz-theme@@font-family-tag: 'Maple Mono NF CN', Bookerly, 'Microsoft YaHei', STzhongsong, STSong, 'Segoe UI Emoji', Serif
blue-topaz-theme@@font-family-strong: 'Maple Mono NF CN', Bookerly,'Inter', 'Segoe UI', 'LXGW WenKai Screen', 'LXGW WenKai Screen R', '霞鹜文楷 GB', 'LXGW WenKai', 'Segoe UI Emoji', var(--font-interface)

blue-topaz-theme@@font-family-vault: 'Maple Mono NF CN', 'Lucida Handwriting', 'Segoe UI Emoji'
